titles.title: To congratulate the Northwestern University Wildcats on winning the 1995 Big Ten Conference football championship and on receiving an invitation to compete in the 1996 Rose Bowl, and to commend Northwestern University for its pursuit of athletic and academic excellence.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Economic and Educational.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Economic and Educational

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Economic and Educational Opportunities

bill.summary: 12/7/1995--Introduced. Congratulates Northwestern University on the winning of the 1995 Big Ten Conference football championship and on the receipt by the Wildcats of an invitation to compete in the 1996 Rose Bowl. Commends the University for its pursuit of athletic as well as academic excellence.
